title: DTL EULA Request
content: I attempted to e-mail Frank Blokland, but the e-mail was returned to me, twice. So I ask you, my fellow typophiles, if anyone has licensed from DTL? If yes, do you have a copy of the EULA? If yes, can you e-mail me a copy? Thank you.
author: Miss Tiffany

comments.content: Tiffany really needs that EULA. Frank are you listening?

Yes Frank, both Tiff and her alter-ego need that EULA :-)

ChrisL
